INTRODUCTIONSKILLS: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of working on  different projects using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies.
MOTIVATION: Show that you are motivated to improve your skills, implement innovative solutions and stay abreast of new technologies.
JEXPLAINPROJECT: Task manager modeled on the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functionality, and assign users and categories.
JLEARNED: In the project, I learned about agile methods like Scrum, which promote effective teamwork. Merge conflicts were successfully resolved through shared use of Git.
EPLEXPLAINPROJECT: El Pollo Loco is a small, challenging browser game in which you defeat enemies by jumping, collect bottles and finally defeat the crazy, big chicken.
EPLLEARNED: A browser game with object-oriented programming was implemented that integrates interactive elements and dynamic game mechanics. I learned how to apply OOP concepts in a game context and how to implement advanced functions.
PEXPLAINPROJECT: A Pokedex is a digital encyclopaedia that lists all Pokémon types, including their characteristics, abilities and evolutions. It serves as a reference work.
PLEARNED: In the Pokedex project, I integrated an API to retrieve relevant Pokémon data and display it in appealing images. This allowed me to learn how to handle API information and its visual presentation in a practical way.
ONGOINGTEXT: Are you currently working on a project? What is it about and what technologies are you using? Emphasise that good planning and execution are essential to the success of your work and to achieving great results.
WHATCOLLEAGUESSAID: Here what my colleagues said about me
REFERENCE_1: „Michael is a reliable and friendly person. He works in a structured way and writes clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.“
REFERENCE_2: Patrik is a reliable and friendly person. He works in a structured way and writes clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.“
REFERENCE_3: Bob is a reliable and friendly person. He works in a structured way and writes clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.“
ACCEPTPRIVACYPOLICE: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as described therein.
ENCOURAGETEXT: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Express confidence in your ability to make a meaningful contribution to a team through your expertise and enthusiasm for improving your skills.

PROJECTS.title: Project Join
PROJECTS.description: Task manager modeled on the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.learned: During the project, I got to know agile methods such as Scrum, which promote effective teamwork. Merge conflicts were successfully resolved through the shared use of Git.

PROJECTS.title: Project El Pollo Loco
PROJECTS.description: El Pollo Loco is a small, challenging browser game in which you defeat enemies by jumping, collect bottles and finally defeat the crazy, big chicken.
PROJECTS.learned: A browser game with object-oriented programming was implemented that integrates interactive elements and dynamic game mechanics. I learned how to apply OOP concepts in a game context and how to implement advanced functions.

PROJECTS.title: Project Pokedex
PROJECTS.description: A Pokedex is a digital encyclopaedia that lists all Pokémon types, including their characteristics, abilities and evolutions. It serves as a reference work.
PROJECTS.learned: In the Pokedex project, I integrated an API to retrieve relevant Pokémon data and display it in appealing images. This allowed me to learn how to handle API information and its visual presentation in a practical way.
